1887 Old Judge Ward SGC 20 Fair 1.5 (card has surface wear specks of paper loss on right side of body from ribs below pocket to upper hip on right side of the card. There is also a chipped bottom left corner.)-$350.00

S/h is an additional $7.50 (certified mail). If paying by PayPal, please pay by PayPal Gift/Friends and Family. [url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url]
